title: Perimeter of S
text: Perimeter of S is $$b+a+b+\pi r=2b+a+\pi \frac{a}{2}$$ since $$r=\frac{a}{2}$$ in the semi-circle.
speech: Perimeter of S is  b plus a plus b plus pi r is equal to 2 b plus a plus, pi a over 2  since  r is equal to a over 2  in the semi-circle.
pacedSpeech: Perimeter of S is   b plus a plus b plus pi r is equal to 2 b plus a plus, pi a over 2
since   r is equal to a over 2

title: Perimeter of S
text: Since $$perimeter=100$$, what is the correct mathematical equation?
